channel.title: After Effects on Petfactory
channel.description: Recent content in After Effects on Petfactory

item.title: AE - Misc
item.description: Below are some misc snippets regarding AE that might be useful. Shortcuts Timeline Custom shortcuts Function Key Set layer in to CTI Alt Gr [ Set layer out to CTI Alt Gr ] Trim layer(s) in to CTI Ctrl [ Trim layer(s) out to CTI Ctrl ] Default shortcuts Function Key Go to start of layer Alt Shift Ctrl L-Arrow Go to end of layer Alt Shift Ctrl R-Arrow Workarea begin B Workarea end N Go to time dialog Alt Shift J CTI to next Keyframe 1 K CTI to prev Keyframe 1 J * 1 - Also workarea and markers
